com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.executor.api.listener

Class AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.executor.api.listener.AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, ExecutionListener, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadsAndWritesReportingExecutionListener, ReadsReportingExecutionListener, StatementsReportingExecutionListener, WritesReportingExecutionListener

    public abstract class AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListener
extends com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
implements ExecutionListener
    An ExecutionListener that reports useful metrics about ongoing bulk read and write operations. It relies on a delegate MetricsCollectingExecutionListener as its source of metrics.

      • onRowReceived

        public void onRowReceived(Row row,
                          ExecutionContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ExecutionListener
        Called when a row has been successfully received. Applicable only for reads.

        Note: this method is called when the row is effectively read and emitted to downstream subscribers, which might be later than the moment when it was made available by the driver.

        Specified by:
        onRowReceived in interface ExecutionListener
        Parameters:
        row - the row.
        context - the local request execution context.
